pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Tcare Servicebus Validotor (tcare-sbv)This package was developed to validate all messages passed to and received from azure service bus. This is achieved by a series of common schemas declared with Pydantic's class-based validation.# PublishingThis package was published using [this guide](https://packaging.python.org/en/latest/tutorials/packaging-projects/) provided by python.org
